channel.title: Need help with Interface ~
channel.description:
I want to use the interface of the Tzhaar viewing orb. You know the orb where you can view different places at Tzhaar minigame. Now i want that if i click like 'West' on the interface tele somewhere.
How I Could do this?
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img386.imageshack.us/img386/6958/vieworbnp7.png[/img][/URL]
^ The view orb
If i right click on 'hiii' where I want to tele somewhere it says that the ID Is 15240.
Please help me ~
